text: Dennis Tito became the first "space tourist" in human history paying his own way to the International Space Station aboard a Russian Soyuz spacecraft.

Apple opened the iTunes Music Store with 200,000 songs at 99 cents a piece. Songs could play on any iPod and up to three authorised Macs. Windows users were out of luck but tracks could be burned to unlimited numbers of CDs.

Apple unveiled the "third-generation" iPod. The new iPods were thinner and featured the bottom Dock Connector port rather than the top-mounted FireWire port. The iPod controls also became entirely touch sensitive.
